name: Running in some sort of space wich is some times a little bit lacking of some kind of space
name_original: Running in some sort of space wich is some times a little bit lacking of some kind of space
description:
made in 72h for the 42th Ludum dare.

The main goal is to dodge the ton of bugs i left in the game. While doing so, you can discover what kind of interaction is possible between different objects, by linking or simply bringing them together.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/running-in-some-sort-of-space-wich-is-som...

gamepad recommended

=Pad controls=

left stick to move

right clic to orient yourself

right shoulder to grab an object

left shoulder to link an object to another

X (ps4) or A (xbox) button to remove links from an object

=Keyboard controls=

arrows to move

can't orient yourself, did i say i recommend playing with a pad ?

'C' to grab an object

'X' link an object to another

'V' to remove links from an object
